statements: SELECT * FROM LoanCreditData LIMIT 10
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_amount > 10000
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM LoanCreditData WHERE credit_score >= 700
SELECT loan_id, loan_date FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM LoanCreditData WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_amount < 5000
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM LoanCreditData WHERE borrower_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT AVG(credit_score) AS avg_credit_score FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT DISTINCT borrower_name FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_date < '2022-07-01'
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData WHERE credit_score >= 700
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_amount > 15000
SELECT loan_id, credit_score FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_id <= 100
SELECT * FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_amount = (SELECT MAX(loan_amount) FROM LoanCreditData)
SELECT loan_id, loan_date FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_amount > 10000 AND credit_score >= 700
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM LoanCreditData WHERE credit_score < 600 ORDER BY loan_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT borrower_name FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS average_loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData WHERE credit_score >= 700 AND loan_amount < 15000
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_date FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT * FROM LoanCreditData WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice'
SELECT MIN(loan_amount) AS min_loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 700
SELECT * FROM LoanCreditData WHERE credit_score NOT IN (650, 675, 700)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT borrower_name) AS unique_borrowers FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS average_loan_amount_by_credit_score, credit_score FROM LoanCreditData GROUP BY credit_score
SELECT SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM LoanCreditData
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_date FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_amount > 20000
SELECT * FROM LoanCreditData WHERE loan_date = CURDATE()
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name FROM LoanCreditData WHERE credit_score >= 650 AND loan_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE interest_rate < 5.0;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores WHERE risk_level = 'low';
SELECT customer_id, risk_level FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.loan_amount, credit_scores.credit_score FROM loans JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.loan_amount, credit_scores.credit_score FROM loans INNER JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE loans.loan_amount > 20000;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.customer_id, loans.interest_rate, credit_scores.credit_score FROM loans LEFT JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id;
SELECT loans.customer_id, credit_scores.credit_score FROM loans RIGHT JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id;
SELECT loans.loan_id, credit_scores.risk_level FROM loans FULL JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE loans.loan_amount < 15000;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM loans;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM credit_scores;
SELECT MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan FROM loans;
SELECT MIN(interest_rate) AS min_interest_rate FROM loans;
SELECT SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loans;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(loan_id) AS num_loans FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT risk_level, AVG(credit_score) AS avg_credit_score FROM credit_scores GROUP BY risk_level;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(interest_rate) AS min_interest_rate FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 AND interest_rate < 0.1;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT MAX(loan_amount) AS max_loan_amount FROM loans;
SELECT AVG(interest_rate) AS avg_interest_rate FROM loans;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, risk_level FROM loans JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score < 600);
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM credit_scores WHERE risk_level = 'High');
SELECT customer_id, AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(loan_amount) > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(credit_score) AS max_credit_score FROM credit_scores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, risk_level FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 650 AND risk_level = 'Medium';
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE interest_rate = (SELECT MIN(interest_rate) FROM loans);
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans INNER JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_loans > 1;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(interest_rate) AS avg_interest_rate FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_interest_rate < 0.05;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans UNION SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM credit_reports;
SELECT report_id, credit_score FROM credit_reports WHERE credit_score >= 700;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(loan_amount) FROM loans GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(credit_score) FROM credit_reports GROUP BY customer_name HAVING AVG(credit_score) > 600;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_id IN (SELECT loan_id FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000);
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, loans.loan_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS average_loan_amount FROM loans;
SELECT SUM(credit_score) AS total_credit_score FROM credit_reports;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customers.customer_name, loans.loan_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, loans.loan_amount, credit_reports.credit_score FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id INNER JOIN credit_reports ON customers.customer_id = credit_reports.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, count(loans.loan_id) as loan_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;
SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(loans.loan_amount) as total_loan_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;

SELECT customers.customer_name, AVG(credit_reports.credit_score) as avg_credit_score FROM customers LEFT JOIN credit_reports ON customers.customer_id = credit_reports.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 20000);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND customer_email NOT LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customers.customer_name, loans.loan_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE loans.loan_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customers.customer_name, credit_reports.credit_score FROM customers INNER JOIN credit_reports ON customers.customer_id = credit_reports.customer_id WHERE credit_reports.report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customers.customer_name, loans.loan_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE loans.customer_id IS NULL;
SELECT customers.customer_name, loans.loan_amount FROM customers RIGHT JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT customers.customer_name, loans.loan_amount FROM customers FULL JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE loans.loan_amount > 50000;

SELECT customers.customer_name, loans.loan_amount, credit_reports.credit_score FROM customers FULL JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id FULL JOIN credit_reports ON customers.customer_id = credit_reports.customer_id;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) as avg_loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, SUM(loan_amount) as total_loan_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customers.customer_name, MAX(credit_score) as max_credit_score FROM customers INNER JOIN credit_reports ON customers.customer_id = credit_reports.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;

SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_status FROM loans;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_status FROM payments;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.loan_amount, payments.payment_amount FROM loans INNER JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id;

SELECT customers.first_name, loans.loan_amount, payments.payment_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id INNER JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_rating = 'good';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'completed';

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, loans.loan_amount, payments.payment_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id INNER JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id WHERE payments.payment_status = 'completed';
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, credit_scores.credit_score FROM customers INNER JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id;

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, payments.payment_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id INNER JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id WHERE payments.payment_amount > 5000;
SELECT customers.first_name, loans.loan_date FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE loans.loan_amount < 5000;
SELECT customers.first_name, credit_scores.credit_rating FROM customers INNER JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE credit_scores.credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_rating = 'Good' AND credit_score > 700;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'Approved';
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, loans.loan_amount FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id;
SELECT payments.payment_id, payments.payment_amount, loans.loan_amount FROM payments LEFT JOIN loans ON payments.loan_id = loans.loan_id;
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, credit_scores.credit_rating FROM customers INNER JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT loan_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY loan_id;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(loan_id) AS num_loans FROM customers LEFT JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, loan_amount FROM customers, loans WHERE customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id AND loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, payment_amount FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(credit_score) AS average_credit_score FROM credit_scores GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT loan_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-06-30' AND payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, payments.payment_amount FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payment_status = 'Completed';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score < 600);

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM customers LEFT JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_payments > 5000;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, loan_amount, payment_amount FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id LEFT JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id WHERE loan_status = 'Approved' AND payment_date < '2022-09-30';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, credit_score, credit_rating FROM customers JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, payment_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payment_amount IS NULL;

SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_date FROM loans WHERE customer_id = 100;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT customer_id, credit_score, credit_rating FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_rating = 'Good';
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, credit_limit FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_limit >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, loan_id, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM risks;
SELECT loan_id, risk_factor FROM risks WHERE risk_factor = 'High';
SELECT loan_id, risk_description FROM risks WHERE risk_description LIKE '%default%';
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.customer_id, customers.customer_name FROM loans INNER JOIN customers ON loans.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.loan_amount, payments.payment_amount FROM loans LEFT JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.loan_date, risks.risk_description FROM loans RIGHT JOIN risks ON loans.loan_id = risks.loan_id;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.customer_id, payments.payment_id FROM loans FULL JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id;
SELECT loans.loan_amount, payments.payment_amount, risks.risk_factor FROM loans INNER JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id INNER JOIN risks ON loans.loan_id = risks.loan_id;
SELECT * FROM loans JOIN customers ON loans.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, age, address FROM customers JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT loan_amount, payment_amount FROM loans JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id WHERE payment_amount > loan_amount;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT * FROM loans JOIN risks ON loans.loan_id = risks.loan_id WHERE risk_factor LIKE '%High%';
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments JOIN customers ON payments.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, age, address FROM customers WHERE age < 30;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount IN (SELECT MAX(loan_amount) FROM loans);
SELECT customer_name, credit_rating, credit_limit FROM customers JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, age, loan_amount FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT loan_id, risk_factor, risk_description FROM risks WHERE risk_factor = 'High';
SELECT customer_name, age, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_date < '2022-10-15';
SELECT customer_name, credit_rating, credit_limit FROM customers JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE credit_rating = 'Good' AND credit_limit < 10000;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > (SELECT AVG(loan_amount) FROM loans);
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_date >= '2022-01-01' AND loan_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, credit_rating FROM customers JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE credit_rating = 'Fair';
